cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs on August 4, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5900, an act to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2016 East 1st Street in Los Angeles, California, as the “Marine Corps Reserve PVT Jacob Cruz Post Office

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 195 (Friday, November 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOMEZ:
H.R. 5900.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18
[Page H6236]
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2016 East 1st Street in Los Angeles, California, as the "Marine Corps Reserve PVT Jacob Cruz Post Office".
